<title level="1" right="Trait">[Stheno](/Traits.aspx?ID=365)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

Stheno are humanoids related to medusas, with snakes for hair.
